amendment.description: To expand aviation capacity and alleviate congestion in the greater Chicago metropolitan area.

vote.text: Amendment SA 911 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 911 proposed by Senator Hollings for Senator Bayh. (consideration: CR S7804; text: CR S7804) To expand aviation capacity and alleviate congestion in the greater Chicago metropolitan area.
